option.name: font
option._long: Sets the font to use for the title bars.

option.name: font_size
option._long: Sets the font size to use for the title bars.

option.name: active_title
option._short: Title color when window is active
option._long: Sets the title color when the window is active.

option.name: inactive_title
option._short: Title color when window is inactive
option._long: Sets the title color when the window is inactive.

option.name: border_size
option._long: Sets the border size in pixels.

option.name: active_border
option._long: Sets the color when the window is active.

option.name: inactive_border
option._long: Sets the color when the window is inactive.

option.name: corner_radius
option._long: Sets the radius of the decoration corners.

option.name: outline_size
option._long: Sets the outline size in pixels.

option.name: active_outline
option._long: Sets the outline color when the window is active.

option.name: inactive_outline
option._short: Outline color when window is inactive
option._long: Sets the outline color when the window is inactive.

option.name: button_style
option._long: Sets the style to be used for the buttons.

option.name: button_padding
option._long: Sets the padding to be used for the buttons.

option.name: inactive_buttons
option._long: Sets the style to be used for the buttons.

option.name: ignore_views
option._short: Decoration disabled for specified window types
option._long: Disables window decoration for windows matching the specified criteria.

option.name: layout
option._short: The layout to be used for decoration placement
option._long: Sets the order and positioning of title, icon and buttons
option.default: title next next minimize maximize close -
